name: You Are Rich?
description:
Are you rich and do you have money left over? Prove it by buying this wonderful diamond. The game that all the rich love!

Donald Trump: "Since I bought this, my idea about children working in South Africa has improved, we have to send more children to work there."

Pope Francis: "We had money left over in the Vatican so we decided to buy this for each of the priests."

Amancio Ortega: "With the money I owed to my workers I bought 1000 of these, I recommend it, it is very bright."

Jeff Bezos: "I did not know what else stupid to spend my money, seeing this I was clear."

Why spend your money paying your debts? Why spend your money on NGOs? No! Nothing of that! Buy this wonder, you'll be happy!
